text: Boizel in Avenue de Champagne. Champagne Boizel is a Champagne producer based in the Épernay region of Champagne. The house, founded in 1834, produces both vintage and non-vintage cuvee as well as a blanc de blancs Chardonnay Champagne and a rosé. T. Stevenson, ed. The Sotheby's Wine Encyclopedia (4th Edition) pg 178 Dorling Kindersley 2005 ==See also== * List of Champagne houses ==References== Category:Champagne producers
title: Champagne Boizel
